alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued May 10 at 8:06AM EDT until May 10 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Little Assawoman Bay and the tidal waterways that flow into it. * WHEN...From 3 PM EDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
